Title: 2020 Chevrolet Corvette 2dr Stingray Cpe 2LT * Glass Roof * Front Lift
Desc: DescriptionClean CarFax 2020 Chevrolet Corvette Coupe C8 2LT 6.2L V8 490hp paired to an 8 speed Automatic Transmission in Torch Red on Adrenaline Red and Black leather interior featuring Front Lift, Glass removable roof panel, HUD heads up display, MEM memory package, Performance Exhaust, NAV factory navigation, GT2 bucket seats, front curb view cameras, reverse camera, rearview mirror camera, dual zone automatic climate control, heated and cooled seats, BOSE performance series stereo, wireless phone charger, High mount wing, 8-way power seats with power adjustable lumbar and side bolsters, remote engine start, LED tail lights, LED headlights, solar-ray light-tinted glass.   CarFax:https://vhr.carfax.ca/?id=%2fBU75tg9UchqwnQv0PCX5%2bFHktthEJDg   Yes we take trade in vehicles.   Check us out on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iG8pb3hFHPU  Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/munromotors/  We are located in Brantford, Ontario; Telephone City and the hometown of hockey legend Wayne Gretzky. Formerly located in St. George, Ontario for ten years, we are still east of London, south of Cambridge, and west of Hamilton. In order to get our customers to come here, we have to have great prices and then when you get here, we have to have a great car in order to earn your business.  Our business hours are Monday to Friday 10am to 5pm. We are closed on Saturdays and Sundays.  At Munro Motors, we find unique vehicles and post our entire stock online in order to ensure that our vehicles find their happy home.  To ensure our customers can get what they've always wanted, we offer financing services through TD Auto Finance, Desjardins, CIBC Auto Finance and Independent Leasing Companies on vehicles that are less than ten model years old and boats that are less than twenty-five model years old.  We also offer warranty products through Lubrico and GVC warranties to ensure that your mechanical baby stays in tip-top condition.  Because of our customer focused service we have been delivering vehicles to Switzerland, Finland, Rotterdam, Emo, Thunder Bay, Kapuskasing, Halifax, Sudbury, Sault Ste. Marie, Cornwall, Fort Francis, Kelowna, Montréal, Saskatchewan, Virginia, Newfoundland, Edmonton, Ottawa, Fredericton and Winnipeg, as well as Cambridge, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Windsor, London, Pickering, Peterborough, Oshawa, Sante Fe New Mexico, Blind River, the Greater Toronto Area, and even so far as the Czech Republic!  All of our vehicles are hand-picked by the very knowledgeable owner, Andy Munro, who has been connecting people to their dreams for many years.  Call Andy Munro at 1 (877) 738-8063 Munromotors.com   Email: sales@munromotors.com  Most of our vehicles are already reconditioned, saftied, etested and ready to drive home with you.   Delivery is available. Ask for details   All prices are subject to HST and licensing, no hidden fees.  Financing is available for good credit and bruised credit. OAC as low as 4.89% for well qualified applicants. Ask us for details. COVID-19 Update: We want to assure our customers that we are open and available in person or online anytime. During Covid-19 purchases can be completed online with our Touchless Process. Once paperwork has been completed we will deliver the vehicle in an enclosed trailer to your door at no extra cost, within 100km of the dealership. To support social distancing, we will put the car in your driveway with all the paperwork and keys in the car then stand away from a distance while you inspect your new toy. If you have a trade-in we will take it back to the dealership in our trailer. All of our vehicles have been thoroughly sanitized; our cars are already certified and can be delivered with our Touchless Process. We have access to a local Service Ontario office which at this time has remained open. It is our goal to keep everyone safe while still having Fun!

GM Owner Centre and Mobile AppWhat is Live Market Pricing?Lally Chevrolet, we've changed the way we sell new and pre-owned vehicles with Live Market Pricing. Buying a vehicle can be stressful. Negotiations, trade value, hidden fees and the time a purchase takes is enough to make anyone nervous.How does a customer know if they are getting a good deal or not?How do dealerships like Lally Chevrolet even set prices?In today's customer-centric, tech-savvy world, where is the transparency in the car buying process?We want to make your vehicle purchasing experience stress-free, simple, enjoyable and transparent. So we've made the struggle of negotiating a thing of the past!No More Stressful Negotiations!Purchasing your next vehicle shouldn't feel like a battle. Our team at Lally Chevrolet does not want you to go home wondering if you could have gotten a better deal or not. So, we are offering you the best deal possible, the fair value, with Live Market Pricing.How Does Live Market Pricing Work?With Live Market Pricing, our team checks the fair value of our vehicles every day, comparing equally-equipped vehicles in a 300 kilometer radius of our market area. Then, we update our inventory prices in real-time to reflect the current market price.This allows us to price our vehicles in our market area fairly while passing the savings onto you. With Lally Chevrolet Live Market Pricing system, you can rest assured that you're getting the most competitive price around town.These real-time results offer fair pricing for you, the customer, and eliminates the need for negotiations. Lally Chevrolet Live Market Pricing ensures:? no pricing games? no stressful negotiations or pressure situations? no mark-up to mark-down gimmicks? no hassling? no haggling? no more guessing.Why buy your next vehicle from Lally Chevrolet?We provide an excellent assortment of vehicles. You can find up to 300 new and pre-owned vehicles here at any given time! Hand picking only the best, low mileage and cleanest vehicles in our area.We provide an assortment of leasing and financing options to fit your needs. We have multiple lending partners to provide you with the best finance rates, lease rates and terms available. We want to get you approved and driving!CARFAX Reports are provided with all pre-owned vehicles. We are transparent and upfront with all vehicle disclosure to ensure you piece of mind with your vehicle purchase. No surprises here!SAFETY FIRST! All vehicles undergo a rigorous and detailed mechanical safety inspection by our GM Certified Technicians. The Accord Sedan Sport 2.0 features a 2.0 litre, 16-valve, Direct Injection, DOHC, i-VTEC® turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, 252 horsepower engine, six-speed manual transmission or available 10-speed automatic transmission (AT) with Grade Logic Control with Sport mode button and steering wheel-mounted paddle shifters. HandsFreeLink-Bilingual Bluetooth® wireless mobile phone interface, Bluetooth® Streaming Audio, and HondaLink™ keeps you connected to what's important.The one-touch power moonroof (sunroof) with tilt feature, chrome grille, dual exhaust with chrome finisher, rear deck lid spoiler and 19 inch aluminium-alloy wheels are boldly styled to complement the interior. Parking is effortless with the multi-angle rearview camera with dynamic guidelines. Call us at 905-670-3738 or email at customercare@tabangimotors.com to book an appointment. Our address is 5926 Shawson Dr, Mississauga, On, L4W3W5. A face covering is required during your visit. Maximum 2 persons per appointment. Thank you!_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________CERTIFICATION: Have your new pre-owned vehicle certified at Tabangi Motors! We offer a full safety inspection exceeding industry standards including oil change, and professional detailing prior to delivery. Vehicles are not drivable, if not certified and not e-tested, certification package is available for $595. All trade-ins are welcome. Taxes and licensing are extra._____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ SERVICE: Schedule an appointment with Tabangi Service Centre to bring your vehicle in for all its needs. Simply click on the link below and book your appointment. Our licensed technicians and repair facility offer the highest quality services at the most competitive prices. All work is manufacturer warranty approved and comes with 2 year parts and labour warranty. Start saving hundreds of dollars by servicing your vehicle with Tabangi. Call us at 905-670-8100 or follow this link to book an appointment today! https: calendly.com tabangiservice appointment __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Tabangi Motors is family owned and operated for over 20 years and a trusted member of the UCDA. Our goal is not only to provide you with the best price, but more importantly a quality reliable vehicle and the best customer service with absolutely no pressure. Come visit our new 25,000 sq. ft. building and indoor showroom and take a test drive today!__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ PRICE: We believe everyone deserves to get the best price possible on their new pre-owned vehicle without having to go through uncomfortable negotiations. By constantly monitoring the market and adjusting our prices below the market average you can buy confidently knowing you are getting the best price possible! No haggle pricing. No pressure. Why pay more somewhere else?__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ WARRANTY: This vehicle qualifies for an extended warranty with different terms and coverages available. Don’t forget to ask for help choosing the right one for you.__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ FINANCING: No credit? New to the country? Bankruptcy? Consumer proposal? Collections? You don’t need good credit to finance a vehicle. Bad credit is usually good enough. Give our finance and credit experts a chance to get you approved and start rebuilding credit today! On the spot financing, instant approvals, and no payments for 6 months is also available O.A.C!Engine: 4 Cylinder

Title: 2018 Hyundai Santa Fe Sport Premium
Desc: Description2.4L Premium AWD We do our best to ensure pricing and vehicle information are accurate and updated on a regular basis. We endeavour to get those changes to the website within the same business day. Prices may be changed at any time without notice. Please contact our sales department for confirmation of any information pertaining to any vehicle in inventory. PRE-OWNED 7-DAY EXCHANGE POLICYPre-owned vehicle can only be exchanged in the event of major mechanical problems. Mechanical problems must be reported to Formula Ford Lincoln within 7 days (starting from delivery date) or 500 kms, whichever comes first. Vehicle must be inspected by Formula Ford Lincoln prior to exchange to confirm mechanical problems reported. Upon inspection of the vehicle, if mechanical problems reported are a direct result of an undisclosed accident by owner or third party, modifications or alterations made by owner or third party or deemed as owner neglect, the 7-day exchange policy shall be void and not applicable and owner will be responsible for inspection fee. One (1) single exchange per client (name of owner as outlined on Bill of Sale) is permitted at Formula Ford Lincoln. The 7-day guarantee is only valid for 7 days, starting from delivery date or 500 kms, whichever comes first, accompanied by original Bill of Sale for proof of purchase. Some exclusions apply. See below.The vehicle selected for exchange must be of equal or greater value than vehicle purchased outlined on Bill of Sale. If vehicle selected for exchange is greater in value than vehicle on original Bill of Sale, a one-time payment is required to cover price difference. All applicable taxes as required by law will be included.In the event of an exchange, any equipment that was added by Formula Ford Lincoln to the original vehicle as outlined on Bill of Sale, can be moved to the new vehicle at the customer’s expense. If equipment cannot be moved, items on original purchased vehicle are non-refundable. The exchanged vehicle must be returned in the same apparent condition and state it was in on original date of delivery. The vehicle exchange program cannot be assigned, transferred or sold, in whole or in part. The exchanged vehicle must first be inspected by Formula Ford Lincoln and approved for exchange. The exchange program does not apply to Second Chance Credit and alternative financing clients on all purchases made after February 1, 2020.Exclusions: The 7-day exchange policy shall be void for all Vehicles that have been damaged by the customer or anyone else, Commercial vehicles, Vehicles that have been modified or altered by the customer or third party, in any way whatsoever, Vehicles that have been inspected and repaired without prior authorization from Formula Ford Lincoln. The 7-day exchange policy is subject to change without notice.Engine: 4 Cylinder Engine

Desc: DescriptionFUN AND STYLISH! Meet the 2021 Infiniti QX50 Essential Tech. This QX50 comes with a 2.0-LITRE VC-TURBO 4-CYLINDER ENGINE w/ CVT TRANSMISISON INTELLIGENT AWD. Safety features include Vehicle Dynamic Control w/ Traction Control, Direct Adaptive Steering, Forward Emergency Braking w/ Pedestrian Detection, Rear Front Parking Sensors, Around View Monitor w/ Moving Object Detection, Blind Sport Warning, Blind Sport Intervention, Rear Automatic Braking, Rear Cross Traffic Alert, Lane Departure Warning, Lane Departure Prevention, Distance Control Assist ProPilot Assist. Additional features include Leather Seating, Heated Steering Wheel, Clean Air Micro Filter, Dual Zone Temperature Control System, 60/40 Rear Folding Seat, Remote Start, Infiniti Intelligent Key, Bluetooth, Infiniti InTouch w/ Navigation, Infiniti InTouch Dual Display System, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, HD Radio, Siri Eyes Free, WI-Fi Hotspot, USB Ports, 16-Speaker Bose Performance Series Audio System, Power Rear Liftgate, Moonroof, Rear Spoiler, LED Headlights, Roof Rails 20-Inch Silver Painted Machined Wheels Wheels. Feeling protected and taken care of is an invaluable part of the Infiniti customer service objective. That is why we offer the following extensive warranty on all our Infiniti models: 4-year/100,000 km basic coverage / 6-Year/110 km powertrain warranty. What Guelph Infiniti Offers: The largest selection of New Infiniti vehicles in Southwestern Ontario. Best-in-class pricing on all of our inventory with clear and transparent pricing, providing you with the best online experience. Located in the heart of the Guelph Auto Mall. We have been serving the Kitchener-Waterloo, Cambridge, Stratford, Ancaster, and Brantford areas for over 35 years. The only luxury vehicle dealership in Guelph. Our knowledgeable and friendly sales staff are ready to provide a higher level of service you will not find in areas like Niagara, Fergus, or Elora. When thinking of a new Infiniti Car, CUV, SUV, or Sports Car, stop by and see us at: 943 Woodlawn Road, West, Guelph, Ontario, N1K 1C9 or visit us online at: www.guelphinfiniti.comEngine: Intercooled Turbo Premium Unleaded I-4 2.0 L/121

Title: 2020 Acura MDX Tech AWD w/ CarPlay & Android Auto, Moonroof, Navi
Desc: DescriptionNO ACCIDENTS / 2 OWNER / CLEAN CARFAX / and more!       All Clutch cars are SAFETY CERTIFIED, come with a 10-day / 750km MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE and FREE TO-YOUR-DOOR DELIVERY.       Purchases can be completed 100% online and have no hidden fees. Skip the dealership and buy your next car online with Clutch!       Click “Visit Dealer Website” or go to Clutch.ca to view 360-degree photos, 210-point inspection reports, and to begin the online checkout process.       Standout Features for this 2020 Acura MDX include:    *Apple CarPlay    *Android Auto    *Rearview/Back Up Camera    *Navigation    *Power Liftgate    *Remote Engine Start    *Push Button Start    *Keyless Entry    *Power Moonroof/Sunroof    *Rain Sensing Wipers    *Automatic On/Off Headlights    *Heated Front Seats    *Heated Steering Wheel    *7 Seater    *Power Driver Seat    *Blind Spot Warning     *Lane Departure Warning    *Adaptive Cruise Control    *Parking Sensors    *Lane Keeping Assist      Why Clutch?       PURCHASE ONLINE - Buying online with Clutch is quick, easy, and secure. With our online checkout, you can build your own deal and complete all necessary paperwork digitally from the comfort of your home. Every vehicle we sell comes with a 90-day / 6,000km warranty, whichever expires first. Choose between cash or finance, include your trade-in, and pick from any of our warranty and protection plans.       GUARANTEED CAR QUALITY - Clutch Certified Cars are high quality, and every car comes with a 10-day money-back guarantee. Our cars also pass a 210+ point inspection, which is available to view online, and come with an oil change, professional detailing, CarFax report, and Safety Standards Certificate. You can take a full 360-degree tour of each of our vehicles online at Clutch.ca.       HASSLE-FREE, MORE SAVINGS - At Clutch, we don’t have high-pressure tactics, commissioned salespeople or fancy showrooms so we can pass savings onto you. Our online experience allows you to seamlessly browse and buy from the comfort of your own home saving you money and providing you with a convenient customer experience.       TRANSPARENCY - What you see is what you pay. No hidden "certification" fees here. All Clutch vehicles are Safety Certified and ready to be driven away.       CONTACTLESS DELIVERY - All Clutch deliveries are contactless. Any paperwork that requires your signature will be left in your freshly disinfected vehicle. No need to shake hands or interact with anyone in person.       HEALTH & SAFETY - Your well-being is our biggest priority. All high-touch surfaces in our facility are frequently cleaned and all vehicles are thoroughly disinfected before and after each use. Employees are working remotely or on-call in accordance with social distancing best practices.      List prices do not include tax or government licensing fees.       Stock # 7935    Vehicle location is not customer-facing. The vehicle can be viewed in person at the time of delivery. Please call us for more details.

Desc: Description*Low Mileage!*This Ford Super Duty is the toughest, most capable pickup truck that Ford has ever built, and that’s saying a lot. This 2021 Ford F-250 Super Duty is fresh on our lot in Guelph.The most capable truck for work or play, this heavy-duty Ford F-250 never stops moving forward and gives you the power you need, the features you want, and the style you crave! With high-strength, military-grade aluminum construction, this F-250 Super Duty cuts the weight without sacrificing toughness. The interior design is first class, with simple to read text, easy to push buttons and plenty of outward visibility. This truck is strong, extremely comfortable and ready for anything. This low mileage sought after diesel Crew Cab 4X4 pickup has just 5,489 kms. It's gray in colour . It has an automatic transmission and is powered by a 475HP 6.7L 8 Cylinder Engine. Title: 2014 Hyundai Santa Fe Sport Premium Auto A/C Cruise
Desc: DescriptionWelcome Ontario customers! All our vehicles are Ontario safety check/e-tested. We offer financing adapted to your needs, no tax hassle we charge 13% GST/HST Ontario tax, fully bilingual staff, open 6 days a week and only 13 km away from Parliament Hill. For Quebec customer, we charge the QST (9.975%) and GST (5%) taxes. Bienvenue Chers clients de l'Ontario! Tous nos véhicules sont certifiés aux normes de l'Ontario inspections mécaniques/test anti-pollution. Aucun souci concernant les taxes car nous facturons les taxes de l'Ontario 13% (HST). Notre équipe est bilingue, nous offrons des possibilités de financement adaptées à vos besoins, ouvert 6 jours par semaine et nous sommes situé à seulement 13 km du Parlement. Pour client du Québec, nous facturons la TPS (5%) et la TVQ (9.975%).Chers clients de l'Ontario, tous nos véhicules sont certifiés aux normes ontariennes (inspections mécaniques et tests antipollution) et les taxes facturées pour les résidents de l'Ontario sont de 13% (HST). Nous offrons plusieurs possibilités de financement adaptées à vos besoins. Nous sommes situés à seulement 13 km du Parlement, venez nous voir! Notre équipe bilingue est prête à vous servir 6 jours par semaine!Veuillez noter que pour les client du Québec, la TPS (5%) et la TVQ (9.975%) seront facturées.

Our Highlander's trim level is XLE AWD. This vehicle has been upgraded with the following features: Navigation, Sunroof, Leather Seats, Heated Seats, Rear View Camera, Bluetooth, Blind Spot Detection. Title: 2021 Ram 1500 Classic Night Edition
Desc: DescriptionWe are the #1 FCA/Stellantis Retailer in the Nation! NOBODY BEATS A DEAL FROM PEEL and we prove it everyday with our low prices! Come see one of the largest selections of inventory anywhere! DO NOT BUY until you come to us! Go ahead, shop around and you will see that NOBODY BEATS A DEAL FROM PEEL!!! All advertised prices are for cash sale only. Optional Finance and Lease terms are available. A Loan Processing Fee of $499 may apply to facilitate selected Finance or Lease options. If opting to trade an encumbered vehicle towards a purchase and require Peel Chrysler to facilitate a lien payout on your behalf, a Lien Payout Fee of $299 may apply. Contact us for details. These prices are web specials for online shoppers. Please mention this ad when contacting us. We thank you for your interest and look forward to saving you money. Prices are subject to change, prior sales excluded. Our inventory changes daily and this vehicle may already be sold and require us to order a new one on your behalf or facilitate a dealer locate. Vehicle images may be illustrations based on vin decoding while actual pics are pending upload and may not represent exact model shown. "CERTIFIED BY VOLVO" we've got you covered (6-YEAR/160,000 Kilometers Limited Warranty)

6-year/160,000 km warranty, upgradeable up to 10 years**,

**You also have the option to add up to 4 years/80,000 km of extra coverage with Volvo Increased Protection Mechanical Breakdown Protection (MBP). More about Volvo MBP: https://bit.ly/2XPG20A
When you buy a Certified by Volvo vehicle, you’re getting more than a great previously owned vehicle. You’re getting our commitment to your satisfaction. We accept only the best pre-owned Volvos, and we make them even better with our signature quality and safety.
All pre-owned vehicles receive the latest software upgrades, and Volvo-approved checks to certify they meet our safety, performance, and appearance standards.


Have a Trade-In? We accept all makes and models of vehicles!
Multiple Financing options available! (Our price excludes H.S.T. and licensing costs.)


WELCOME TO VOLVO OF OAKVILLE:
The story of Volvo of Oakville is one of unwavering commitment to customer service. After all, a car dealership has only its approach to customer experience and offering value to stand out. Our new and pre-owned vehicles may offer exceptional quality, but we're not the only ones to have them in stock. We must therefore make sure we put customer satisfaction first in order to stand out.  
That's how we have been able to grow and differentiate ourselves from our competition over the years. At Volvo of Oakville, our commitment to serving customers with dedication begins with our team. Everyone you meet at Volvo of Oakville knows that without you, the customer, we would not be in business. That's why they don’t take your needs lightly.
Come and meet us today to discover a team and an experience that goes beyond your expectations, whether for the purchase or maintenance of a vehicle.

AN EXCEPTIONAL EXPERIENCE FOR VOLVO OWNERS:
At Volvo of Oakville, we try to differentiate ourselves by offering our clients a top-of-the-line experience at every visit. When you become a Volvo owner, you'll get the best after-sales service in town. Our technical advisors know Volvo vehicles by heart and your satisfaction is important to them. Moreover, our technicians are trained by the manufacturer to ensure the quality of their work.
After-sales service at Volvo of Oakville will always be there for you to preserve the qualities you love about your Volvo. We also have many other services to offer, such as detailing and a comprehensive parts and accessories department.
 
Come meet us today or use our website to book your appointment: http://bit.ly/2N0CSDF
CLICK HERE FOR ADDITIONAL INVENTORY LISTINGS: https://bit.ly/3bLmyRK

We endeavour to get those changes to the website within the same business day. Prices may be changed at any time without notice. Please contact our sales department for confirmation of any information pertaining to any vehicle in inventory. PRE-OWNED 7-DAY EXCHANGE POLICYPre-owned vehicle can only be exchanged in the event of major mechanical problems. Mechanical problems must be reported to Formula Ford Lincoln within 7 days (starting from delivery date) or 500 kms, whichever comes first. Vehicle must be inspected by Formula Ford Lincoln prior to exchange to confirm mechanical problems reported. Upon inspection of the vehicle, if mechanical problems reported are a direct result of an undisclosed accident by owner or third party, modifications or alterations made by owner or third party or deemed as owner neglect, the 7-day exchange policy shall be void and not applicable and owner will be responsible for inspection fee. One (1) single exchange per client (name of owner as outlined on Bill of Sale) is permitted at Formula Ford Lincoln. The 7-day guarantee is only valid for 7 days, starting from delivery date or 500 kms, whichever comes first, accompanied by original Bill of Sale for proof of purchase. Some exclusions apply. See below.The vehicle selected for exchange must be of equal or greater value than vehicle purchased outlined on Bill of Sale. If vehicle selected for exchange is greater in value than vehicle on original Bill of Sale, a one-time payment is required to cover price difference. All applicable taxes as required by law will be included.In the event of an exchange, any equipment that was added by Formula Ford Lincoln to the original vehicle as outlined on Bill of Sale, can be moved to the new vehicle at the customer’s expense. If equipment cannot be moved, items on original purchased vehicle are non-refundable. The exchanged vehicle must be returned in the same apparent condition and state it was in on original date of delivery. The vehicle exchange program cannot be assigned, transferred or sold, in whole or in part. The exchanged vehicle must first be inspected by Formula Ford Lincoln and approved for exchange. The exchange program does not apply to Second Chance Credit and alternative financing clients on all purchases made after February 1, 2020.Exclusions: The 7-day exchange policy shall be void for all Vehicles that have been damaged by the customer or anyone else, Commercial vehicles, Vehicles that have been modified or altered by the customer or third party, in any way whatsoever, Vehicles that have been inspected and repaired without prior authorization from Formula Ford Lincoln. The 7-day exchange policy is subject to change without notice.Engine: 1.5L ECOBOOST

Title: 2022 Jeep Grand Cherokee L Altitude
Desc: DescriptionIt's almost here! This vehicle is on order and waiting to be built and delivered to Bay King. Did you take a look at the specs and decided this is something you might be interested in? Contact us for more information or to purchase this vehicle before it lands!As large as life, our 2022 Jeep Grand Cherokee L Laredo 4X4 is built for bigger adventures in Velvet Red Pearl! Motivated by a 3.6 Litre Pentastar V6 providing 290hp connected to an 8 Speed Automatic transmission for full-size strength. This Four Wheel Drive SUV is ready for action with a multimode Selec-Terrain system and returns nearly approximately 9.4L/100km on the highway, plus it has a poised and premium appearance. Clean sculpting sets the tone and is set off by a lean profile, LED lighting, heated power mirrors, roof rails, and bold alloy wheels.Our Laredo cabin lets up to six people travel in comfort with supportive cloth front seats, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, tri-zone automatic climate control, 12V power outlets, and high-end infotainment features. You'll especially appreciate the 8.4-inch touchscreen with wireless Android Auto/Apple CarPlay, Amazon Alexa compatibility, Bluetooth, WiFi compatibility, and a six-speaker audio system. Take advantage of the easy-to-access cargo space for extra family-focused functionality!Explore your world with confidence knowing Jeep safeguards your travels with smart driver assistance from a backup camera, forward collision warning, adaptive cruise control, front/rear automatic braking, a blind-spot monitor, active lane management, and hill-start assist. Own our Grand Cherokee L Laredo, and you'll make more out of driving! Save this Page and Call for Availability. We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership! Desc: DescriptionAWD S-LINE NAV ROOF CAM LEATH P/SEAT HS P/GATE!  This 2016 Audi Q5 is for sale today.  There's something special that sets this Audi Q5 that sets it apart from the dozens of luxury crossovers available. Maybe it's the contemporary, yet timeless exterior styling. Maybe it's the unique balance of fun, sporty performance with the versatility of expanded interior volume. It might be the exhilaration of the steering wheel in your hands or the thrills it commands while you take in the winding road ahead. No matter your reasons, you have the capability to leave tracks where your journey takes you - in the one vehicle that is ready to leave its impression on you. This SUV has 155,369 kms. It's gray metallic in colour . It has an automatic transmission and is powered by a 2.0L I4 16V GDI DOHC Turbo engine.   Our Q5's trim level is 2.0T quattro Technik. The Technik trim adds advanced technology to this versatile Q5. It comes with an AM/FM radio with SiriusXM, Bluetooth, and 10-speaker audio, parking sensors, blind spot assist, leather seats which are heated in front, a leather-wrapped steering wheel with audio and cruise control, dual-zone automatic climate control, a power sunroof, a chrome grille, aluminum wheels, HID headlights, and more. This vehicle has been upgraded with the following features: Awd S-line Nav Roof Cam Leath P/seat Hs P/gate. It will render your expectations obsolete with precision performance and incredible technology. From its aggressively sculpted exterior and driver-oriented cockpit, this beautiful Corvette is a combination of brilliant engineering and purpose-driven design making it an instant classic. This low mileage convertible has just 2,826 kms. It's yellow in colour . It has a 8 speed auto transmission and is powered by a 490HP 6.2L 8 Cylinder Engine. Desc: DescriptionE-450 DRW 158" WB We do our best to ensure pricing and vehicle information are accurate and updated on a regular basis. We endeavor to get those changes to the website within the same business day. Prices may be changed at any time without notice. Please contact our sales department for confirmation of any information pertaining to any vehicle in inventory. Should an error occur in pricing please refer to the window sticker on this page for the correct MSRP.Eligible customers financing through Ford Credit/Lincoln AFS may defer their first 3 monthly vehicle payments. The customer will not make their first payment for 120-days.The end result of the Deferred Payment program is that the customer’s overall contract term is extended for a period of 3-months (As an example a 60-month finance contract will actually be paid off after 63-months)There is no impact on the actual amortization period of the contract (A 60-month term is still amortized over 60-months).The Deferred Payment is only available to customers that purchase an eligible vehicle and finance through Ford Credit or Lincoln AFS.Interest Accrual:Ford of Canada will cover the interest charges during the deferral period. Stipulations for Qualification:This offer is only available on Ford Credit and Lincoln AFS purchase contracts. It is not available to leasing customers or customers that do not finance through Ford Credit or Lincoln AFS.Bi-Weekly Retail Contracts are ineligible for a deferred 1st payment. This deferred payment offer is only available to customers that choose a monthly payment plan (up to 84-months).The customer cannot defer payment for a shorter or longer period of time.Only Tier 0-2 customers are eligible. This offer is on approved credit (OAC) from Ford Credit/Lincoln AFS.All contracts must be dated during the program period.Eligible Vehicles: 2019-Model Mustang (Ecoboost/GT), Nautilus, Edge, Mustang Bullitt, F-150 Regular Cab, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) Platinum/Limited, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) XLT/Lariat/KingRanch, Expedition, F-250 to F-450 Pick-Up, Escape, Ranger, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Gas), Navigator, Eco Sport2020-Model Corsair, Explorer, Escape (Non S), Mustang Ecoboost Premium, Edge SEL/Titanium, Mustang GT, Continental (Non Livery), MKZ, Eco Sport, F-250 to F-450 Pick-Up, Edge ST, F-150 Regular Cab, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Gas), Navigator, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) Platinum/Limited, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) XLT/Lariat/King Ranch, Expedition, Nautilus, Aviator, Ranger Super Cab XLT, Escape Hybrid, Ranger Super Crew, Fusion, Mustang Bullitt Eligible customers may use the Customer Cash as a down payment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.Taxes payable before savings deducted. 32307 - First Responders Appreciation offer:To recognize the bravery and selflessness of our front-line workers, those who risk their lives daily so that we can stay safe, we are pleased to extend an exclusive $1,000 Appreciation Bonus.All eligible first responders (see customer eligibility below) that purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle in May or June, will be entitled to an additional $1,000 Appreciation Bonus. This incremental $1,000 can be used toward their vehicle purchase/lease or issued as a rebate cheque. It will also be combinable with all “Built to Lend a Hand”/”Lincoln Way” programs. Eligible first responders (that qualify for the offer) include:Eligible Customers: Canadian Forces Personnel: Active service personnel, current reservists, veterans and their respective spouses, First Responders: Active Canadian firefighters, police, EMT/paramedics, 911 dispatchers and their respective spousesProfessional Healthcare Workers: Active Nurses, Doctors and Professional Healthcare Workers at Canadian hospitals, clinics and retirement/nursing homes, Active Pharmacists/Pharmacist TechniciansEngine: 7.3L V8 ECONOMY-RATED

Title: 2007 Porsche 911 Turbo, AWD, NAV, TURBOCHARGED, CHRONO PKG
Desc: Description2007 PORSCHE 911 TURBO | 3.6L H6 | TURBOCHARGED | MANUAL | NAVIGATION | AXLE-DIFFERENTIAL LOCK REAR | PARKING ASSIST SYSTEM | SPORT CHRONO PACKAGE TURBO | REMOTE CD CHANGER | BLACK LEATHER INTERIOR | HEADLIGHT CLEANER | BLACK MATS WITH PORSCHE LETTERING | SPORT SEATS | CUSTOM EXHAUST SYSTEM | CUSTOM SUPPLIED 997 STEERING WHEEL | EIBACH LOWERING KIT | FRONT BLACK PLASTIC LIP | CLEAN CARFAX | CANADIAN VEHICLE  The 2007 Porsche Turbo has a turbocharged engine with variable-geometry turbos that make 473 horsepower and 502 pound-feet of torque—58 horses and 87 pound-feet more than the last one. It also has a 4wheel-drive system with electronic control over the way torque is distributed among the four wheels. And thanks to the use of aluminum in key locations, it's about 90 pounds lighter than the 996 Turbo. Aluminum doors alone save 31 pounds. The Turbo benefits from the more communicative steering integral to every 997-based model. Coupled with the 4-Wheel Drive system that's integrated with the PSM, you can hang the tail out with the best of the Porsche crazies and still rely on the stability-control system to save you from your worst excesses. If you do choose to turn the PSM off, the system doesn't automatically come back on under braking as it did before. It only does so when you brake hard enough to engage the ABS. Around the famous Ring, the 997 Turbo is more than 10 seconds faster than a Carrera S, putting its time in the 7:50 range. WE WELCOME YOUR TRADE at the highest value. SAME DAY, EASY APPROVALS. FINANCING and LEASING options on most vehicles, as well as extended warranties, and aftermarket services. We are connected to all banks and leasing companies - all at the lowest rates and payments. No-HASSLE, No-HAGGLE, just the BEST PRICE UP-FRONT.  Since 2004, Platinum Cars took the concept of Platinum Lifestyle to a whole new level by offering many of the world's most pristine vehicles, such as Aston Martin, BMW, Bentley, Ferrari, Hummer, Land Rover, Lamborghini, Maserati, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Rolls-Royce and much more. Check out our website for our full inventory listing at http: www.platinumcars.ca, or simply stop by and visit our 65,000 sq.ft indoor showroom. Running strong as an independent dealership, we serve guests all across Canada. By understanding the lifestyle of each guest, we provide an immaculate collection of the best luxury and exotic vehicles on the market. We gladly provide the full history report on every vehicle.  As per OMVIC regulations: Vehicle is not drivable, not certified and not e-tested. Certification is available for $699. Each Platinum client is a satisfied guest, GUARANTEED! Title: 2021 Porsche 911 Turbo S CONVERTIBLE ,640HP, CARBON CERAMIC BRAKES
Desc: Description2021 PORSCHE 911 TURBO S CONVERTIBLE | 3.8L H6 TWIN TURBO 640HP | AWD | SPORT CHRONO PACKAGE | HEATED AND VENTED SEATS | ADAPTIVE SPORT SEATS PLUS | PORSCHE ENTRY & DRIVE | POWER STEERING PLUS | LIGHT DESIGN PACKAGE | BOSE HIGH END SOUND | PORSCHE CERAMIC COMPOSITE BRAKES | ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL | SURROUND VIEW CAMERA SYSTEM | PORSCHE ACTIVE SAFE | LANE CHANGE ASSIST | FRONT AXLE LIFT | PORSCHE LED DYNAMIC LIGHTS (PDLS PLUS) | LOCAL ONTARIO VEHICLE | CLEAN CARFAX | NEW VEHICLE FACTORY WARRANTY    The Porsche 911 Turbo S Convertible possesses an aggressive yet classy appearance with a Black Metallic exterior mated with a Premum Black Leather interior and Black Leather dash. The Exterior is also enhanced with 20-inch 911 Turbo Wheels. Porsche also fits the Ceramic Composite Brake (PCCB) as a standard option on the Turbo S model.    This 911 is also optioned with the Aerokit Turbo. It has a distinctive front spoiler and redesigned rear lid with side winglets. Not only the kit makes the car look more appealing, the kit underwent wind tunnel testing and has increased the downforce capabilities while minimizing any added drag effect.    You'll love the driving experience. Porsche's AWD Model with a rear engine layout makes this an absolute beast yet refined with every steering wheel movement. With a 3.8L Twin-Turbocharged engine making 640 HP mated to the quick shifting PDK transmission is an incredible combination! That power with the AWD System will make sure that you will be in control of the car. The PDK and AWD as well as the 640HP engine will accelerate this car to 60mph in just 2.8 Seconds. The car also comes standard with Porsche Dynamic Chassis Control (PDCC) active roll stabilization system for the best cornering performance. Porsche claims its PDCC technology enhances cornering performance by keeping the tires in their optimal position at all times, while minimizing body roll.    Features like power-operated sport seats, parking sensor, Heated and Vented Seats, along with Satellite radio and premium speakers provide you with comfort and convenience. To keep you safe, this 911 is equipped with Traction Control, Stability Control, Anti-lock brakes, Airbags (front, side-impact).  WE WELCOME YOUR TRADE at the highest value. SAME DAY, EASY APPROVALS. FINANCING and LEASING options on most vehicles, as well as extended warranties, and aftermarket services. We are connected to all banks and leasing companies - all at the lowest rates and payments. No-HASSLE, No-HAGGLE, just the BEST PRICE UP-FRONT.  Since 2004, Platinum Cars took the concept of Platinum Lifestyle to a whole new level by offering many of the world's most pristine vehicles, such as Aston Martin, BMW, Bentley, Ferrari, Hummer, Land Rover, Lamborghini, Maserati, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Rolls-Royce and much more. Check out our website for our full inventory listing at http: www.platinumcars.ca, or simply stop by and visit our 65,000 sq.ft indoor showroom. Running strong as an independent dealership, we serve guests all across Canada. By understanding the lifestyle of each guest, we provide an immaculate collection of the best luxury and exotic vehicles on the market. We gladly provide the full history report on every vehicle.  As per OMVIC regulations: Vehicle is not drivable, not certified and not e-tested. Certification is available for $699. Each Platinum client is a satisfied guest, GUARANTEED!  Serving ALL OF CANADA AND U.S.A, we will help with the transportation and paperwork. For all Canadian buyers, you will only pay your provincial tax. For all American clients, you will take advantage of the low exchange rate. Desc: DescriptionAt Kia of Hamilton we strive to exceed expectations! With that, we meticulously go through each of our vehicles and double any expectation of safety that the ministry defines. This includes inspecting and repairing the following items:Check full operation of all features and options equippedEnsure minimum 50% tread depthEnsure 50% Brake Pad life Oil ChangeWiper BladesAll lights are operationalAlignmentEnsure there are no liensConfirm vehicle drives and shifts as builtNo chips or cracks in the windshieldAll bushings and control arms are in great condition with no cracks and replaced as requiredFull detail throughout to make this vehicle as like-new to you as possible. For more info give us a call @ 905 547 7726. Experience KIA of Hamilton's easy, comfortable and quick Buy Smart Registered Value Program. (BRVP), only License extra. All trades welcome.Disclaimer: Although every attempt is made to ensure the accuracy of the information above, due to the possibility of human error, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of the displayed information.Prices are plus HST. Should you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to meeting new people every day and will never stop finding new ways to improve. Desc: Description2018 JAGUAR F-TYPE R-DYNAMIC CONVERTIBLE | AWD | P380 | V6 SUPERCHARGED | 380HP | R-DYNAMIC BODY KIT | SPORT SEATS | VISION ASSIST | LED HEALIGHTS | 19'' RIMS | PARKING SENSORS | MEMORY SEATS | PUSH START BUTTON | PADDLE SHIFTERS | NAVIGATION | BACK UP CAMERA | MERIDIAN SOUND SYSTEM | KEYLESS ENTRY | REMOTE ENGINE START | ADJUSTABLE STEERING WHEEL | HEATED MIRRORS | BLIND SPOT ASSIST | SATELLITE RADIO | MIRROR MEMORY | LANE DEPARTURE WATNING | AUTO LEVELING HEADLIGHTS | BRAKE ASSIST | ELECTRONIC STABILITY CONTROL | CLEAN CARFAX | CANADIAN VEHICLE  Distinctive and Instinctive is in its blood; this Jaguar F-Type R-Dyanamic is powered with its 3.0L Supercharged V6 380 HP All-Wheel Drive System. It has Intelligent Driveline Dynamics, Jaguar Super Performance Braking System, Sport Suspension with Adaptive Dynamics, Electronic Active Differential with Torque, Dual Exhaust , and Torque Vectoring. The car is driver focused; it has advanced performance features and comfort. This F-Type R-Dynamic comes in Corris Gray Metallic Exterior Color and Red Leather Interior color with Sport Seats. It also features a Push-to-Start button, Ignis gear shift paddles, and Configurable Ambient Interior Lighting with a selectable palette. Other convinient features include a rearview camera with front and rear parking sensors, an adaptive speed limiter , remote access, forward-collision warning with automatic emergency braking, lane keep assist, blind-spot monitoring, brake assist, and single-zone climate control. Title: 2011 Hyundai Equus | CLEAN CARFAX | CERTIFIED | SUNROOF | HEA...
Desc: DescriptionTest Drive this captivating 2011 Hyundai Equus, located at Brampton Auto Mart, before it too late! These sedan's are well known for their ultra luxury features that can compete with Mercedes and Audi, if you're looking for luxury without the hefty price tag that comes with it, look no further than the Equus!  Coming loaded with a ton of luxurious features such as Heated Seats, Sunroof, Navigation, Massage Seats and so much more! Carproof report provided with all our vehicles! Have a Trade-in? We accept all makes and models of vehicles! This vehicle is being sold Safety certified and road ready to ensure you as a consumer can drive away with peace at mind! Come on by to Brampton Auto Mart to take it for a test drive while it lasts!All of our certified vehicles come with a FREE 2 Year Tire Guard Warranty and a FREE 2-Year Secure-Gard protection with a replacement benefit of up to $4000!*Accident Free*, *Sunroof*, Heated front seats, Memory seat, Navigation System, Ventilated front seats.Black 2011 Hyundai Equus Signature RWD 6-Speed Automatic with Shiftronic 4.6L V8 DOHC 32V Dual CVVTAll of our certified vehicles go through multi-point mechanical inspection to ensure each vehicle meets our quality and safety standards. All of these vehicles come with a free vehicle history report, safety inspection report and 30 days Limited Warranty. Advertised price does not include HST and Licensing. We welcome trades and pay top dollar for your vehicle.Brampton AutoMart is part of Weins Canada established in 1973 (Formerly Don Valley Auto Group) with 14 dealership across the GTA. Brampton AutoMart is your home of great quality vehicles and offer a premium experience at a pre-owned price. We will find you the right vehicle at a price you can trust with our Upfront, "haggle-free" pricing. We also offer worry-free financing options and will help you get into the vehicle of your choice. No Credit? Bad Credit? Bankrupt? NO PROBLEM! WE WILL HELP YOU RE-ESTABLISH YOUR CREDIT! O.A.C!We are located at 55 Auction Lane Brampton, ON. Located on the Adesa Auto Auction Property! Call us today to book your appointment (289)341-1BAM(226).

Please contact our sales department for confirmation of any information pertaining to any vehicle in inventory. PRE-OWNED 7-DAY EXCHANGE POLICYPre-owned vehicle can only be exchanged in the event of major mechanical problems. Mechanical problems must be reported to Formula Ford Lincoln within 7 days (starting from delivery date) or 500 kms, whichever comes first. Vehicle must be inspected by Formula Ford Lincoln prior to exchange to confirm mechanical problems reported. Upon inspection of the vehicle, if mechanical problems reported are a direct result of an undisclosed accident by owner or third party, modifications or alterations made by owner or third party or deemed as owner neglect, the 7-day exchange policy shall be void and not applicable and owner will be responsible for inspection fee. One (1) single exchange per client (name of owner as outlined on Bill of Sale) is permitted at Formula Ford Lincoln. The 7-day guarantee is only valid for 7 days, starting from delivery date or 500 kms, whichever comes first, accompanied by original Bill of Sale for proof of purchase. Some exclusions apply. See below.The vehicle selected for exchange must be of equal or greater value than vehicle purchased outlined on Bill of Sale. If vehicle selected for exchange is greater in value than vehicle on original Bill of Sale, a one-time payment is required to cover price difference. All applicable taxes as required by law will be included.In the event of an exchange, any equipment that was added by Formula Ford Lincoln to the original vehicle as outlined on Bill of Sale, can be moved to the new vehicle at the customer’s expense. If equipment cannot be moved, items on original purchased vehicle are non-refundable. The exchanged vehicle must be returned in the same apparent condition and state it was in on original date of delivery. The vehicle exchange program cannot be assigned, transferred or sold, in whole or in part. The exchanged vehicle must first be inspected by Formula Ford Lincoln and approved for exchange. The exchange program does not apply to Second Chance Credit and alternative financing clients on all purchases made after February 1, 2020.Exclusions: The 7-day exchange policy shall be void for all Vehicles that have been damaged by the customer or anyone else, Commercial vehicles, Vehicles that have been modified or altered by the customer or third party, in any way whatsoever, Vehicles that have been inspected and repaired without prior authorization from Formula Ford Lincoln. The 7-day exchange policy is subject to change without notice.Engine: 4 Cylinder Engine

Title: 2022 INFINITI Q50 LUXE
Desc: DescriptionDARE TO BE BOLD. Meet the all-new 2022 INFINITI Q50 LUXE! This Q50 comes equipped with a 3.0-Litre V6 Twin-Turbocharged Engine w/ 300 hp 295 lb-ft torque, including 7-Speed Automatic Transmission, and Intelligent All-Wheel Drive. Safety features include Brake Assist, Electronic Brake force Distribution, Vehicle Dynamic Control w/ Traction Control, Tire-specific Pressure Monitoring System, INFINITI Vehicle Immobilizer, Forward Emergency Braking, Predictive Forward Collision Warning , RearView Monitor, Around View Monitor w/ Moving Object Detection, Blind Spot Warning, Lane Departure Warning w/ Haptic Steering Wheel, Backup Collision Intervention, Intelligent Cruise Control w/ Full Speed Range, and Distance Control Assist. Added features also include Leather-appointed seating, Heated leather-wrapped steering wheel, 60/40 split fold-down rear seats, Intelligent Key w/ Push Button Ignition, Remote engine start, Homelink, INFINITI InTouch Dual HD display system, Wireless Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Bluetooth, Bose Performance Series Audio 16-speaker stereo with Bose Centerpoint, Two illuminated USB connection ports, SiriusXM, and Wi-Fi hotspot. The exterior also offers 18-Inch Aluminum-Alloy Wheels, Power moonroof, Automatic on/off LED headlights w/ LED daytime running lights, LED fog lights, and Rain-sensing wipers! Feeling protected and taken care of is an invaluable part of the Infiniti customer service objective. That is why we offer the following extensive warranty on all our Infiniti models: 4-year/100,000 km basic coverage / 6-Year/110 km powertrain warranty. What Guelph Infiniti Offers: The largest selection of New Infiniti vehicles in Southwestern Ontario. Best-in-class pricing on all of our inventory with clear and transparent pricing, providing you with the best online experience. Located in the heart of the Guelph Auto Mall. We have been serving the Kitchener-Waterloo, Cambridge, Stratford, Ancaster, and Brantford areas for over 35 years. The only luxury vehicle dealership in Guelph. Our knowledgeable and friendly sales staff are ready to provide a higher level of service you will not find in areas like Niagara, Fergus, or Elora. When thinking of a new Infiniti Car, CUV, SUV, or Sports Car, stop by and see us at: 943 Woodlawn Road, West, Guelph, Ontario, N1K 1C9 or visit us online at: www.guelphinfiniti.comEngine: Twin Turbo Premium Unleaded V-6 3.0 L/183

RS SPYDER | HEATED AND VENTED FRONT SEATS | HEATED REAR SEATS | PADDLE SHIFTERS | POWER AND MEMORY SEATS | PARK ASSIST | 18-WAY ADAPTIVE SPORTS SEATS | PORSCHE INTELLIGENT PERFORMANCE | LOCAL ONTARIO VEHICLE | CLEAN CARFAXThis 2016 Porsche Macan S is featured in High Gloss Monochrome Black Exterior complemented by a sporty full leather Red and Black Interior and Carbon Fiber Trim. This 2016 Porsche is powered by a 3.0-liter, twin-turbo V6 engine with All Wheel Drive experience that generates 340 Horsepower and 339 lb-ft Torque. 7-inch colour touchscreen offering intuitive ease of use gives the interior and luxurious look. Backup Camera, Surround Camera and Park Assist will help for tight parking situations. Sporty Heated and vented Leather seats with power adjustment. The exterior is enhanced with the 21-Inch 911 Turbo style wheels.  The Premium Package Plus includes Back Up camera and front and Park Assist, Bi-Xenon headlights with PDLS, Heated front and Rear Seats, Porsche Entry and Drive. Bluetooth enabled this Porsche allows for media file playback, which makes it very efficient and easy to control what you want to listen to - also allowing phone call playback through the surround sound. Keyless Entry, Power Seats, Three Dimensional LED Taillights, Multifunction Sport steering wheel with gearshift paddles, Satellite Radio receiver, electrically folding exterior mirrors, active all-wheel drive with electronic and map-controlled multiplate clutch with Automatic Brake Differential (ABD) and Anti-Slip Regulation (ASR) and Rain Sensor enabled.  Full-size airbags for the driver and front passenger, and knee airbags for the driver and passengers. These are supplemented by the Porsche Side Impact Protection (POSIP) system. POSIP consists of side airbags in the front seats, curtain airbags along the entire roof frame and the side windows from the A-pillar to the C-pillar, and side impact protection elements in the doors. Side airbags are standard for the rear compartment.  WE WELCOME YOUR TRADE at the highest value. SAME DAY, EASY APPROVALS. Title: 2022 Dodge Durango GT
Desc: DescriptionOur bold 2022 Dodge Durango GT AWD has a sporty spirit and a design to match in Destroyer Gray! Powered by a 3.6 Litre Pentastar V6 offering 295hp tethered to an 8 Speed Automatic transmission so you can take on your world with confidence. This All Wheel Drive SUV also rolls with responsive handling, and it achieves nearly approximately 9.4L/100km on the highway. Sleek and aggressive, our Durango showcases deluxe details like a menacing black grille, LED lighting, fog lamps, heated power mirrors, a power liftgate, dual-exhaust outlets, and premium 20-inch alloy wheels.Fit up to seven people in our GT cabin, and you'll find impressive comfort for all. Upscale features include heated cloth front seats, eight-way power for the driver, a heated flat-bottomed steering wheel, tri-zone automatic climate control, cruise control, remote entry, and pushbutton ignition. Sophisticated Uconnect technology is at your service with an 8.4-inch touchscreen, Android Auto, Apple CarPlay, Bluetooth, voice command, and Alpine audio. The plenty of flexible cargo space, too.Dodge helps keep you and your loved ones safe with intelligent assistance from a rearview camera, a blind-spot monitor, parking sensors, rear cross-traffic alert, hill-start assist, tire-pressure monitoring, and more. Make your next great discovery by driving our Durango GT today! Save this Page and Call for Availability. We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership! Title: 2016 Nissan Titan XD
Desc: DescriptionCUMMINS-V8 CREW 4X4 LIFT PREM-WHEELS 5inch-SCREEN P/GROUP TOW!  This 2016 Nissan Titan XD is for sale today.  With this Nissan Titan XD, you've got the tools you need for every job. You get awesome capability with epic towing capacity. This truck is held together by a massive chassis and commercially proven components underneath and a smart, spacious cabin up top. This Titan XD has the sense of a light-duty with the heart of a heavy-duty. This sought after diesel Crew Cab 4X4 pickup has 149,970 kms. It's brilliant silver in colour . It has an automatic transmission and is powered by a 5.0L V8 32V DDI DOHC Turbo Diesel engine. This vehicle has been upgraded with the following features: Cummins-v8 Crew 4x4 Lift Prem-wheels 5inch-screen P/group Tow. All certified vehicles include a valid Ontario motor vehicle safety certification! WE COMMIT TO AT LEAST 50% BRAKE LIFE AS WE WILL STAND BEHIND & IN FRONT OF OUR VEHICLES! A full detail as well as a complete sanitation is included for this great price!! This includes ozone treatment of the complete interior, disinfecting the important surfaces including the headliner, covering of the front carpets with protective adhesive plastic, as well as cleaning and detailing of the spare tire well, where applicable!! WE LOVE TRADE INS! On the spot financing, lowest financing rates available on O.A.C.! We're experienced at providing a full range of financing options, depending on your situation!! NO HAGGLE PRICING - CMH AUTO SUPERSTORE will not charge extra above our advertised price for the Ontario Motor Vehicle Safety Certification and Detailing, like some other dealers. Please compare wisely. CMH AUTO SUPERSTORE is proud to say that we are an established, family owned and operated business, for over 21 years! Our 2-1/2 acre location has over 200 vehicles and a 17,000 SQ. FT. building and showroom. CMH AUTO SUPERSTORE IS A PROUD, LONG STANDING MEMBER OF THE BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU WITH AN A+ RATING AS WELL AS A TRUSTED MEMBER OF THE USED CAR DEALER ASSOCIATION (UCDA). Desc: DescriptionWAS: $46998 NOW: $46789 plus taxes and licensing fees--Features include: xDrive All Wheel Drive, 8-speed automatic transmission, 300 horsepower and 300 lb ft of torque from BMWs legendary in-line six cylinder (International Engine of the Year Award Winner)! Head Up Display keeps your eyes safely on the road ahead, Widescreen Navigation will get you there faster, heated steering wheel will make those cold mornings better, backup camera and Park Distance Control work together to make parking a breeze, massive panoramic power sunroof will brighten your day, Comfort Access with push button start allows you to keep your key in your pocket, electric and heated front seats with driver memory will ensure your relaxation, Dual Zone fully-automatic climate control keeps you comfortable, Bluetooth helps keep you connected, rain-sensing windshield wipers aid in preserving a clear view ahead, fully automatic bi-xenon HID headlights provide unparalleled vision, regenerative braking uses what would be wasted energy to power accessories and improve fuel economy, auto stop/start decreases fuel waste, BMW Assist Emergency Call can notify first responders in the event of a serious collision, Stolen Vehicle Recovery can locate your vehicle after it is stolen and may lower your insurance premiums, Dynamic Cruise Control keeps you at the same speed regardless of terrain, power and heated mirrors ensure visibility all year long, Sport/Comfort/Eco Pro modes will make you happy whether you are Dr. Jekyll or Mr. Hyde. In the last few years, BMW has been named the Worlds Most Sustainable Company, Worlds Most Respected Brand, and has been ranked well ahead of its direct competitors in the J.D. Power Initial Quality Study. BMW has won more Wards 10 Best Engine Awards than any other manufacturer in the past decade. BMW has won more International Engine of the Year Awards than any other manufacturer in the past two decades. With so many awards, is it any wonder that BMW is able to offer an unlimited kilometre warranty for your peace of mind? This car is finished in Mineral White Metallic over Mocha Dakota leather and Fineline Pure Wood Trim. We are available 7 days a week to answer your questions online.   Purchase your vehicle through our online process and have it delivered right to your driveway. We will arrange to do a video call walk-around of your selected vehicle at a time that is convenient for you. All online purchases come with a 48 hour, 200km no-hassle no-questions-asked refund policy that starts once you receive contact-less delivery at your home. Fill out the Contact Us now form to speak with a Client Advisor by email or phone, usually within minutes.   ** It's worth the short drive to Kingston! Our pre-owned vehicles do not have any administration fees. Thank you for making us Kingston's #1 Volume Luxury dealership! We are very proud of our client review 4.9/5 rating on Facebook and Google! Client satisfaction is our primary goal. We are only 1.5 hours from the Eastern GTA or Ottawa. We have enclosed trailer delivery right to your driveway available throughout Ontario.   We want your trade-in regardless of make or model! We make the Carfax Vehicle History Reports of all our pre-owned vehicles available for free on our website for a transparent shopping experience. Please don't assume that the vehicle is available for viewing just because it is online - please call ahead to ensure availability. Every vehicle comes with a full tank of fuel no charge and will come to you freshly detailed. We are your best source for Certified Pre-Owned BMW cars and SAVs in Kingston, Belleville, Napanee, Gananoque, Brockville, Ottawa, Toronto, Eastern Ontario, Ontario, Canada, Earth. We can't wait to meet you. Have a nice day!

Desc: Description*Aluminum Wheels, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Remote Keyless Entry, Touch Screen!*With all new and innovative features, this Silverado HD is ready to get the job done. This 2020 Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD is for sale today in Guelph.This Silverado HD has been fully redesigned and is made with high-strength steel where you need it without compromising efficiency. From it's frame to the cargo bed, this heavy-duty truck is designed with seven different types of steel, each gauge chosen to be stronger, lighter and more durable than the previous generation. The Silverado HD comes with more power, more cargo space, more towing, and less curb weight. Its amazing capability also includes next generation tech that will truly elevate your Heavy Duty Silverado to a higher level. This Crew Cab 4X4 pickup has 73,718 kms. It's white in colour . It has a 6 speed auto transmission and is powered by a 401HP 6.6L 8 Cylinder Engine. This unit has some remaining factory warranty for added peace of mind.Our Silverado 2500HD's trim level is LT. Upgrading to this Silverado 2500HD LT is a great choice as it comes with features like aluminum wheels, a larger 8 inch touchscreen with Chevrolet MyLink, bluetooth streaming audio, Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, a heavy-duty locking rear differential, remote keyless entry and an EZ-Lift tailgate. Additional features also include cruise control, steering wheel audio controls, 4G LTE hotspot capability, a rear vision camera, teen driver technology, SiriusXM radio, power windows and much more. Title: 2022 Ford F-150 XLT
Desc: DescriptionXLT 4WD SuperCrew 5.5' Box We do our best to ensure pricing and vehicle information are accurate and updated on a regular basis. We endeavor to get those changes to the website within the same business day. Prices may be changed at any time without notice. Please contact our sales department for confirmation of any information pertaining to any vehicle in inventory. Should an error occur in pricing please refer to the window sticker on this page for the correct MSRP.Eligible customers financing through Ford Credit/Lincoln AFS may defer their first 3 monthly vehicle payments. The customer will not make their first payment for 120-days.The end result of the Deferred Payment program is that the customer’s overall contract term is extended for a period of 3-months (As an example a 60-month finance contract will actually be paid off after 63-months)There is no impact on the actual amortization period of the contract (A 60-month term is still amortized over 60-months).The Deferred Payment is only available to customers that purchase an eligible vehicle and finance through Ford Credit or Lincoln AFS.Interest Accrual:Ford of Canada will cover the interest charges during the deferral period. Stipulations for Qualification:This offer is only available on Ford Credit and Lincoln AFS purchase contracts. It is not available to leasing customers or customers that do not finance through Ford Credit or Lincoln AFS.Bi-Weekly Retail Contracts are ineligible for a deferred 1st payment. This deferred payment offer is only available to customers that choose a monthly payment plan (up to 84-months).The customer cannot defer payment for a shorter or longer period of time.Only Tier 0-2 customers are eligible. This offer is on approved credit (OAC) from Ford Credit/Lincoln AFS.All contracts must be dated during the program period.Eligible Vehicles: 2019-Model Mustang (Ecoboost/GT), Nautilus, Edge, Mustang Bullitt, F-150 Regular Cab, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) Platinum/Limited, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) XLT/Lariat/KingRanch, Expedition, F-250 to F-450 Pick-Up, Escape, Ranger, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Gas), Navigator, Eco Sport2020-Model Corsair, Explorer, Escape (Non S), Mustang Ecoboost Premium, Edge SEL/Titanium, Mustang GT, Continental (Non Livery), MKZ, Eco Sport, F-250 to F-450 Pick-Up, Edge ST, F-150 Regular Cab, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Gas), Navigator, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) Platinum/Limited, F-150 Super Cab & Crew (Diesel) XLT/Lariat/King Ranch, Expedition, Nautilus, Aviator, Ranger Super Cab XLT, Escape Hybrid, Ranger Super Crew, Fusion, Mustang Bullitt Eligible customers may use the Customer Cash as a down payment or choose to receive a rebate cheque from Ford of Canada.Taxes payable before savings deducted. 32307 - First Responders Appreciation offer:To recognize the bravery and selflessness of our front-line workers, those who risk their lives daily so that we can stay safe, we are pleased to extend an exclusive $1,000 Appreciation Bonus.All eligible first responders (see customer eligibility below) that purchase or lease an eligible new Ford or Lincoln vehicle in May or June, will be entitled to an additional $1,000 Appreciation Bonus. This incremental $1,000 can be used toward their vehicle purchase/lease or issued as a rebate cheque. It will also be combinable with all “Built to Lend a Hand”/”Lincoln Way” programs. Eligible first responders (that qualify for the offer) include:Eligible Customers: Canadian Forces Personnel: Active service personnel, current reservists, veterans and their respective spouses, First Responders: Active Canadian firefighters, police, EMT/paramedics, 911 dispatchers and their respective spousesProfessional Healthcare Workers: Active Nurses, Doctors and Professional Healthcare Workers at Canadian hospitals, clinics and retirement/nursing homes, Active Pharmacists/Pharmacist TechniciansEngine: 8 Cylinder Engine

Title: 2022 RAM 2500 Big Horn Crew Cab
Desc: DescriptionHeated Seats, Remote Engine Start, Premium Audio System, LED Bed Lighting! Built to the max of capability and ruggedness, this 2022 2500 also offers a spacious and quiet cabin filled with amazing features. Endlessly capable, this 2022 Ram 2500 pulls all the stops, plus it has the towing capacity to pull pretty much anything. On top of this capability and classic Ram toughness, this 2022 Ram 2500 has an ultra quiet cabin full of amazing tech and luxury features that make your day easier and your work more fun. Come check out everything our 2022 Ram 2500 has to offer! This billet silver metallic Crew Cab 4X4 pickup has an automatic transmission and is powered by a 6.4L V8 16V MPFI OHV engine. Our 2500's trim level is Big Horn. This 2500 Big Horn trim upgrades your ride with 4G wi-fi hotspot, a touchscreen infotainment with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay, chrome exterior accents, and remote keyless entry. This 2500 is built to work as hard as you do with Class V towing equipment, a rear step bumper, and automatic headlamps. Drive confident and connected with Uconnect infotainment with voice activation, bluetooth, and streaming audio, a proximity key with push button start, cruise control, and a back up camera. This vehicle has been upgraded with the following features: Heated Seats, Remote Engine Start, Premium Audio System, Led Bed Lighting. Title: 2021 RAM 2500 Limited - Chrome Styling - Navigation
Desc: Description Low Mileage, Chrome Styling, Woodgrain and Leather Trim, Navigation, Cooled Seats, Leather Seats! This comfortable and very capable Heavy Duty Ram 2500 is a muscular workhorse ready for any job you put in front of it. This 2021 Ram 2500 is fresh on our lot in North Bay. This 2021 Ram 2500 Heavy Duty delivers exactly what you need: superior capability and exceptional levels of comfort, all backed with proven reliability and durability. Whether you're in the commercial sector or looking at serious recreational towing and hauling, this Ram 2500HD is ready for any task. This low mileage sought after diesel Crew Cab 4X4 pickup has just 13,489 kms. It's diamond black crystal pearlcoat in colour . It has a 6 speed auto transmission and is powered by a Cummins 370HP 6.7L Straight 6 Cylinder Engine. This unit has some remaining factory warranty for added peace of mind. Our 2500's trim level is Limited. This Limited is the top trim on the Ram 2500 pushing it into luxury truck territory. On top of the amazing capability, you get a bold, distinct, RAM chrome grille, Uconnect 8.4-inch infotainment system with Bluetooth, SiriusXM satellite radio, and navigation, chrome side steps, remote start, premium heated and ventilated front seats, wood interior trim, and much more. This vehicle has been upgraded with the following features: Chrome Styling, Woodgrain And Leather Trim, Navigation, Cooled Seats, Leather Seats, Heated Seats, Remote Start. Title: 2012 Porsche 911 Targa 4S, CARBON PKG, NAV, CHRONO PKG, PDK
Desc: Description2012 PORSCHE 911 TARGA 4S | AWD | 3.8L FLAT 6 | 385HP | NAVIGATION | SPORT DESIGN STEERING WHEEL | CARBON PACKAGE | SPORT CHRONO PACKAGE PLUS | PDK TRANSMISSION | HEATED SEATS | WHEEL CAPS WITH COLORED CREST | INFOTAINMENT PACKAGE | ADAPTIVE LEATHER SPORT SEATS WITH DRIVER MEMORY | CLEAN CARFAX | LOCAL ONTARIO VEHICLE   Porsche took what it had learned from the 996 and early 997 revisions and in 2009 launched the updated 997.2. The second version of the 997 made some significant departures from the original 997 including a new direct fuel injected engine (9A1) a dual clutch PDK transmission, revised suspension and the all-important from bumper with LED lights. The 997.2 is probably the first time since the air-cooled cars, that Porsche actually got the 911 in the solid reliable spot it needed to be in. This Targa comes in a Carrera White Exterior Color with Black Interior color.  The Targa 4 S featured a cabin better organized than its coupe sibling, due to the rear opening windscreen. That allowed an increase for the storage compartment behind the rear seats. With the Back seats folded, the result was a storage compartment larger and more convenient than the trunk itself. Title: 2016 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque HSE, 2L I4 Turbo, AWD, NAV, 360 CAM, Pano,
Desc: Description2016 LAND ROVER RANGE ROVER EVOQUE | HSE | TURBOCHARGED 2.0L I4 | 240HP | AWD | NAVIGATION | MERIDIAN SOUND SYSTEM | HEADS UP DISPLAY | PANORAMIC SUNROOF | 360 CAMERA | HEATED SEATS | HEATED STEERING WHEEL | VENTILATED SEATS | MEMORY SEATS | BLUETOOTH | SOFT CLOSE DOORS | CLEAN CARFAX | CANADIAN VEHICLE    This 2016 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque HSE is the perfect blend of style, comfort, and versatility. It features a powerful Turbocharged engine mated to a world-renowned 4WD system, smooth automatic transmission with paddle shifters. Featured in a sleek grey exterior finish and Black leather interior.   Its Voice-Command Navigation system, Reverse Camera, and ride-height adjustable suspension allow you to command the road. Enjoy Heated Front Seats, Heated Rear Seats, and a Heated Steering Wheel. Other convenient features include a, Rain Sensing Wipers, Satellite Radio, Premium Sound System, Bluetooth and USB Connectivity, Power Folding Mirrors, and a Power Tailgate. For families, it offers best-in-class safety features like front, side curtain, rear head body airbags, traction and stability control, ABS, and a security system.    The HSE inlcudes a Reliable Navigation System, Massage Seats, Adaptive Cruise Control, Blind Spot Monitoring, Parallel Park Assist, Camera, Meridian Signature Reference audio system Traffic Sign Recognition, Reverse Traffic Detection (warn you about potential collision during reversing), Terrain Response 2 (monitor driving conditions and automatically optimize driveability and traction), Sliding Panoramic Roof, Towing Receiver and InControl Wi-Fi and Soft Close Doors. This vehicle is fully-loaded and sure to sell fast! WE WELCOME YOUR TRADE at the highest value. SAME DAY, EASY APPROVALS. FINANCING and LEASING options on most vehicles, as well as extended warranties, and aftermarket services. We are connected to all banks and leasing companies - all at the lowest rates and payments. No-HASSLE, No-HAGGLE, just the BEST PRICE UP-FRONT.  Since 2004, Platinum Cars took the concept of Platinum Lifestyle to a whole new level by offering many of the world's most pristine vehicles, such as Aston Martin, BMW, Bentley, Ferrari, Hummer, Land Rover, Lamborghini, Maserati, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Rolls-Royce and much more. Check out our website for our full inventory listing at http: www.platinumcars.ca, or simply stop by and visit our 65,000 sq.ft indoor showroom. Running strong as an independent dealership, we serve guests all across Canada. By understanding the lifestyle of each guest, we provide an immaculate collection of the best luxury and exotic vehicles on the market. We gladly provide the full history report on every vehicle. Should you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to meeting new people every day and will never stop finding new ways to improve. Title: 2022 Honda HR-V LX INCOMING FACTORY ORDER
Desc: DescriptionNo adventure too big. No errand too small. The HR-V LX 2WD features a 1.8 litre, 16-valve, SOHC, i-VTEC® 4 cylinder engine that produces 141 horsepower and includes continuously variable transmission (CVT). Designed with fuel efficiency in mind, the continuous variable transmission (CVT) with Eco Assist system produces an estimated 8.4/7.0/7.8 (City/Hwy/Combined) litres per 100 km. The stylish interior features five passenger seating and 60/40 split folding 2nd-row Magic Seats®, which allow you to transport and store just about anything. The heated front seats keep you and your favourite passenger comfortable in any weather.The Display Audio System with HondaLink™ keeps you connected on any trip. The 160-watt AM/FM/CD audio system with MP3/Windows Media® Audio playback capability and 4 speakers will turn every drive up a notch. Discover the ease of Apple CarPlay™ (Apple Auto) and Android Auto™ (Android Play) connectivity, as key content from your smartphone is displayed on the 7 inch display audio system with HondaLink™ Next Generation. Included is the latest in safety innovation from Honda, the Honda Sensing technologies (safety technology).Adaptive Cruise Control with Low Speed Follow, Forward Collision Warning system, Collision Mitigation Braking system, Lane Departure Warning system, Lane Keeping Assist system and Road Departure Mitigation system. Reverse with confidence by utilizing the multi-angle rearview camera with dynamic guidelines. The stylish exterior of the HR-V boasts 17 inch aluminum-alloy wheels, body-coloured rear roofline spoiler and body-coloured heated power side mirrors. The front wiper de-icer and LED brake and daytime running lights allow you to see and be seen in any condition.Premium paint charge of $300 added to this colour.Keep your options wide open.Incoming factory order, available for sale.Experience the Difference at Cambridge Centre Honda! Why Test Drive Here? $25 Gift Card with Test Drive, You choose: drive with a sales person or on your own, extended overnight and at home test drives available. Why Purchase Here? VIP Coupon Booklet: up to $1000 in service & other savings, FREE Ontario-Wide Delivery. Cambridge Centre Honda proudly serves customers from Cambridge, Kitchener, Waterloo, Brantford, Hamilton, Waterford, Brant, Woodstock, Paris, Branchton, Preston, Hespeler, Galt, Puslinch, Morriston, Roseville, Plattsville, New Hamburg, Baden, Tavistock, Stratford, Wellesley, St. Clements, St. Jacobs, Elmira, Breslau, Guelph, Fergus, Elora, Rockwood, Halton Hills, Georgetown, Milton and all across Ontario!
